content.description:
Crux is moving from the diagonal crack and pulling up onto the slab. Crux has a nice bolt.

Just before getting to the first bolt, a purple camalot .5" will protect a small wedge crack.  Do one little step up move and then clip the first bolt. Move up and right on the diagonal crack, past a gold camalot placement and another bolt. Crux is pulling onto slab, but a left hand crimp will appear just when needed. Co tinue to the top past two more bolts and a few gear placements.
content.protection: 4 bolts and gear to 3". 2 bolt anchor with chains. Rap off. Shares anchor with Livin' on the Edge.
content.location: Start 10 feet right of the chimney.

content.description: Crux is pulling past the steep bulge near bolt 3 or 4. Shares the first bolt and last bolt with Big Squeeze.
content.location: Located 40 feet left of the Shadowlands chimney. Start up a low angle, right facing corner. Shares the first bolt with Big Squeeze, then move up and right for bolt 2.

content.description: Climb the various crack systems to the right of Super Good.
content.protection: Gear to 3". Either build a gear anchor on top and walk off, or head left to the bolted anchor of Super Good.
content.location: Start a few feet down and right of the start for Super good.

content.description: Short route on dark rock that shares the anchor with Black Dog.
content.protection: 4 bolts and 2 bolt anchor with Mussy Hooks. Lower off.
content.location: Starts 15 feet left of the chimney.

content.description: Start deep in the chimney. Might help to face into the chimney and stem past the crux. Finish up on the slab and head to the same anchor as Blade Runner at the top of the diehedral.
content.protection: 7 bolts, 2 bolt anchor with Mussy Hooks. Lower off.
content.location: Chimney route on the west side of Middle Earth Valley, near the northern end. Sits across the valley from Sidewinder area to the west. 100 yards north of the Owl.

content.description: Nice long route with a bolt near the crux at the top. Shade in the afternoon.
content.protection: 4 bolts and gear to 2". 2 bolt anchor with chains. Rap off.
content.location: Start 15 feet right of the chimney. Climb up and right past 4th class terrain towards the arete. Start placing gear, turn the corner of arete, step up and clip bolt on arete. Climb up the egde of the arete and head to the slab headwall. Crux just before the anchor.

content.description: Climb the wide crack to the left of Big Squeeze. Use the last two bolts of big squeeze and head to the bolted anchor.
content.protection: Gear to 4" and two bolts. Bolted anchor.
content.location: 5 feet to the left of big squeeze.

content.description: The top half of this route is a right-facing corner system.
content.protection: 6 bolts and 2 bolt anchor with mussy hooks. Lower off. Shares anchor with Shadowlands.
content.location: Starts 25 feet left of the chimney.  This is the third bolted line to the left of the chimney.

content.description: Face climb/ bear hug up pillar on excellent black rock. Crux is passing 2nd bolt. Avoid the crack/gully on either side.
content.protection: 3 new bolts to last 2 bolts and anchor on Big Squeeze.
content.location: On pillar at left end of Zena Rock.

climbs.name: Black Mass
climbs.fa: Jay Crew, Jim Voss, Rich Hoover

content.description: Climb the overhung arete up positive features before encountering a brief thoughtful crux  traverse to the anchors.
content.protection: 4 bolts to double bolt rap chains.
content.location: On the rock to the right of Xena slabs. Â (See pic.)

content.description: An obvious left slanting crack in the middle of the rock face. Stay low for the Dave Evans route or a little higher for more of a challenge.
content.protection: Pro thin to hands. Two bolt anchor with rap rings
content.location: Look at it on the far right of Zena rocks. The right of the two routes on the wall facing "black mass"

content.description: Short vertical crack with plenty of face features
content.protection: pro thin to hands. One bolt to supplement
content.location: Located on the far right end of Zena rocks. Impact of the two routes on the wall facing "black mass"

content.description: Crux is passing the mini bulge near the top. Match on underlings and utilize some small crimp to move higher.
content.protection:
4 bolts and bolted anchor with Mussy Hooks. Lower off.

Shares anchor with the 5.9 to the left.
content.location: Starts 5 feet to the left of the chimney.

content.description: The crux is between the first and second bolt. Then join Black Magic at its end and use its anchor.
content.protection: Two 3/8"x 4" SS bolts, and a .75 or #1 cam for the top if you want, but isn't really needed.
content.location: Right between Black Jack and Black Magic.

content.description: This route was named, not because it is a major squeeze job (which it is), but rather because bolt two is not exactly where you want it while passing the crux. Time to pucker up!
content.location: Same start as Super Good. Shares the first and last bolt with Super good. 40 feet left of the Shadowlands chimney.
